New Records: Ben Stokes scored his first World Cup century
England won their first match in five
Jos Buttler remained England's white-ball captain despite a poor World Cup performance
Key Match Events: Multiple key wickets fell throughout the match
Ben Stokes was player of the match
Pre-Game Insights: Ben Stokes emphasized the importance of staying calm and patient during the innings
Post-Match Reflections: Ben Stokes expressed relief at finally securing a win
Jos Buttler praised the team's effort and looked forward to the upcoming match against Pakistan
Miscellaneous Highlights: Netherlands' batting collapsed in the latter half of the innings
England's net run rate improved in the tournament standings
Others: The match was significant for England's World Cup campaign and qualification hopes
